statements: SELECT * FROM CurrencyBalances;
SELECT player_id, balance, currency_name FROM CurrencyBalances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM CurrencyBalances GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND amount > 100;
SELECT player_id, timestamp FROM TransactionHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, currency_name, balance FROM CurrencyBalances WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY player_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_type, amount, timestamp FROM TransactionHistory WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;

SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_transactions > 10 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;

SELECT t1.player_id, t1.balance AS current_balance, t2.amount AS last_transaction_amount FROM CurrencyBalances t1 JOIN TransactionHistory t2 ON t1.player_id = t2.player_id WHERE t2.timestamp = (SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM TransactionHistory WHERE player_id = t1.player_id) ORDER BY t1.player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM currency_balances
SELECT player_id, balance, currency_name FROM currency_balances WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM currency_balances
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY player_id
SELECT * FROM currency_balances WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT player_id, currency_name, balance FROM currency_balances WHERE currency_name = 'USD'
SELECT player_id, currency_name, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM currency_balances GROUP BY player_id
SELECT player_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY player_id HAVING transaction_count > 5
SELECT player_id, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction_date FROM transaction_history
SELECT player_id, balance FROM currency_balances WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT item_id, item_name, price, available_quantity FROM virtual_goods WHERE price > 100;
SELECT player_id, balance FROM currency_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, balance FROM currency_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT player_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT player_id, balance FROM currency_balances ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT item_name, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT * FROM player_data WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, username, last_login FROM player_data ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM currency_balances GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM virtual_goods WHERE category='Game Items' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT player_id, username, last_login FROM player_data WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type='purchase' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, currency_type, balance FROM currency_balances ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE currency_type = 'USD';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM virtual_goods WHERE item_price > 50;
SELECT username, email FROM user_info WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM currency_balances WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, balance FROM currency_balances WHERE currency_type = 'USD'
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM currency_balances GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_info WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT u.username, COUNT(p.purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM user_info u JOIN purchase_history p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_purchases > 3
